/hpc2hdd/home/xhao390/py/urbanclip/data/:
The image captures a serene street scene in Beijing, China. The perspective is from a low angle, looking up towards the sky, giving a sense of grandeur to the buildings and trees that line the street. The buildings, painted in shades of white and gray, stand tall against the backdrop of a clear blue sky. Their windows reflect the sunlight, adding a touch of brightness to the scene.

The street itself is lined with lush green trees, their leaves rustling gently in the breeze. A few cars are parked along the side of the road, their metallic bodies gleaming under the sunlight. Street lamps stand sentinel along the sidewalk, their presence hinting at the transformation of the scene as day turns into night.

The image is bathed in the warm glow of the sun, casting long shadows and highlighting the architectural details of the buildings. The sun's rays filter through the leaves of the trees, creating a play of light and shadow that adds depth to the scene.

Despite the bustling cityscape, there's a sense of tranquility that pervades the image, perhaps due to the absence of people or the orderly arrangement of the buildings and trees. It's a snapshot of a moment frozen in time, a glimpse into a day in the life of this vibrant city.
